assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Cystic_Fibrosis_Intial_Assessment_Of_severity_Q1_R2
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText:
Expected Outcomes: Sweat chloride levels decrease below 60 mmol/litre or by at least 30% from baseline; OR If baseline levels lower than 60 mmol/litre, decrease by at least 30% or sustained absolute improvement in FEV1 â‰¥ 5%.
Discontinuation Criteria: Failure to achieve expected outcomes
